Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til erhvervsmæssig produktion vedrørende landbrug, gartneri, råstofudvinding o. lign
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for commercial production related to agriculture, horticulture, raw material extraction, etc.

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Række-, kæde-, eller dobbelthus (lodret adskillelse mellem enhederne).
English Translation: (Phased out) Row, linked, or semi-detached house (vertical separation between units)

Original Danish: Anden bygning til undervisning og forskning
English Translation: Other building for education and research

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til anden institution, herunder kaserne, fængsel o. lign.
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for other institution, including barracks, prison, etc.

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til kontor, handel, lager, herunder offentlig administration
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for office, trade, storage, including public administration

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til erhvervsmæssig produktion vedrørende industri, håndværk m.v. (fabrik, værksted o.lign.)
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for industrial or craft production (factory, workshop, etc.)
Holiday center, camping site center, etc.

Original Danish: Bygning til industri uden integreret produktionsapparat
English Translation: Industrial building without integrated production equipment
Apartment building, multi-family house, or two-family house
Health center, medical clinic, maternity clinic, etc.

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Anden bygning til landbrug, industri etc.
English Translation: (Phased out) Other building for agriculture, industry, etc.

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til hotel, restaurant, vaskeri, frisør og anden servicevirksomhed
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for hotel, restaurant, laundry, hairdresser, and other services

Original Danish: (UDFASES) El-, gas-, vand- eller varmeværk, forbrændingsanstalt m.v.
English Translation: (Phased out) Electricity, gas, water, or heating plant, incineration facility, etc.

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Transport- og garageanlæg (fragtmandshal, lufthavnsbygning, banegårdsbygning, parkeringshus). Garage med plads til et eller to køretøjer registreres med anvendelseskode 910
English Translation: (Phased out) Transport and garage facility (freight terminal, airport building, station building, parking garage). Garage for one or two vehicles is registered with code 910

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til undervisning og forskning (skole, gymnasium, forskningslabratorium o.lign.)
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for education and research (school, high school, research lab, etc.)

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til biograf, teater, erhvervsmæssig udstilling, bibliotek, museum, kirke o. lign.
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for cinema, theater, exhibition, library, museum, church, etc.

Original Danish: Restaurant, café og konferencecenter uden overnatning
English Translation: Restaurant, café, and conference center without accommodation

Original Danish: Bygning til håndtering af affald og spildevand
English Translation: Building for waste and wastewater handling

Original Danish: Klubhus i forbindelse med fritid og idræt
Anneks i tilknytning til fritids- og sommerhus
English Translation: Annex to leisure or holiday home
Building for parking and transport facility

Original Danish: Bygning til industri med integreret produktionsapparat
English Translation: Industrial building with integrated production equipment

Original Danish: Bygning til parkering af flere end to køretøjer i tilknytning til boliger
English Translation: Building for parking more than two vehicles near residences

Original Danish: Anden bygning til kontor, handel og lager
English Translation: Other building for office, trade, and storage
Building for railway and bus operations

Original Danish: Hotel, kro eller konferencecenter med overnatning
English Translation: Hotel, inn, or conference center with accommodation

Original Danish: Bygning med ferielejligheder til erhvervsmæssig udlejning
English Translation: Building with holiday apartments for commercial rental

Original Danish: Anden bygning til energiproduktion og forsyning
English Translation: Other building for energy production and supply

Original Danish: Kirke eller anden bygning til trosudøvelse for statsanerkendte trossamfund
English Translation: Church or other building for worship for state-recognized religious communities

Original Danish: Privat servicevirksomhed som frisør, vaskeri, netcafé mv.
English Translation: Private service business such as hairdresser, laundry, internet café, etc.

Original Danish: Bygning til træning og opstaldning af heste
English Translation: Building for horse training and stabling

Original Danish: Bygning med ferielejligheder til eget brug
English Translation: Building with holiday apartments for own use

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Anden bygning til transport, handel etc
English Translation: (Phased out) Other building for transport, trade, etc.

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning i forbindelse med idrætsudøvelse (klubhus, idrætshal, svømmehal o. lign.)
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for sports activities (clubhouse, sports hall, swimming pool, etc.)

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til feriekoloni, vandrehjem o.lign. bortset fra sommerhus
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for holiday camp, hostel, etc., except holiday home

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til hospital, sygehjem, fødeklinik o. lign.
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for hospital, nursing home, maternity clinic, etc.

Original Danish: (UDFASES) Bygning til undervisning og forskning (skole, gymnasium, forskningslabratorium o.lign.).
English Translation: (Phased out) Building for education and research (school, high school, research lab, etc.)
